name: A tale of 2 cubes (Quacky1414)
description:
Hi! This is my first game jam, so i hope you like my game. More levels coming soon!

In this 2d puzzle platformer, you control Bluwy and Greenie. They both have their own strongs and weekneses.

CONTROLS

arrow keys: Move

r: restart

e:menu

Made for the GMTK game jam in 48 hours
